name: hedgi-ai-agents
description: Hedgi AI Agents for SMB bookkeeping and tax prep

scripts.dev: node scripts/kill-port.js && npm run dev --prefix apps/web
scripts.dev:clean: node scripts/kill-port.js && npm run dev --prefix apps/web
scripts.dev:ai: node scripts/kill-port.js && npm run dev --prefix packages/ai
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix packages/ai && npm run build --prefix apps/web
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --prefix packages/ai && npm run type-check --prefix apps/web
scripts.quality: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.quality:fix: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix packages/ai && npm install --prefix apps/web
